extendedInfo.description: Refill prepaid cell phones minutes for less! Get discounts and save money - no taxes, fees or hidden charges!Instantly recharge wireless prepaid phone minutes:* AT&T GoPhone - refill your prepaid airtime minutes* T-Mobile - recharge your Pay As You Go minutes* Verizon - refill your Verizon Wireless airtime minutes* Boost Mobile - Re-boost and top up your phoneComfi, Inc. is an authorized reseller for AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon and Boost Mobile airtime minutes.

reviews.title: Great prices
reviews.comment: I was looking for a way to save on my prepaid phone, and this app helps me save more than from paying taxes at stores like Walgreens and CVS. It also gives discount, so I save myself (and my boyfriend) at least $1 every month I refill. The only thing that throws me off is having to call for verification EVERY time I make the purchase. That should be changed.
reviews.author: Asline Joseph

reviews.title: Works, but...
reviews.comment: I was happy to get this app.  What a great way to rapidly refill my Boost Mobile account.  I took no issue with entering the credit card first, and the prices are what you would normally find on refill accounts.  I tried a $20 to test the app and the refill, then the disappointment.  I had to call them to verify the order.  If I already have the phone in hand, and the last 4 digits of the credit card are showing on the screen, what other info are you looking for?  So I called and verified, and it went through properly.  Can\'t this be done without the verification?  All this being said, I still like the app.  Much handier than a store and / or a pin to deal with.  It would also be nice to have a pin on the app for security purposes.
reviews.author: Brad Foskett

reviews.title: App does not work
reviews.comment: Wont work after update as soon as I open it it says it has stopped working and won\'t open at all this is on galaxy s3
reviews.author: po flo

reviews.title: Works great for MY number, but if I
reviews.comment: add my kids accounts & separate phone#s and refill them, it is credited to my number. I asked customer service about it, they said \"we know, it doesn\'t work well on android phones, just use the website.\" Really? So disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is awesome!
reviews.comment: Instant refill without paying for taxes and shipping costs!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to use
reviews.comment: Nice app. Easily refilled my ATT GoPhone. Got the money on my account in seconds. Don\'t have to go to the website and refill it there anymore..can do it anytime and anywhere
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nonsense
reviews.comment: It took me less than one minute after installation to uninstall it. If there was anything lower  than one star, I would have put a half of it.. there is No need to state the reason,..  please do not waste ur time installing
reviews.author: Don Brume

reviews.title: Pay less
reviews.comment: Whats great about this app is you save by not having to pay for sales tax and the higher denominations have a discount.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Credit card??
reviews.comment: Why do you ask for a credit card first?? What if I dont want to buy?  Should offer to look at prices and whats available first!!
reviews.author: A Google User
